name: River Cleanup #TeamSeas
description:
Help Mr.Beast you to clean up the trash ridden river with your trash collecting drone.

Fly above filthy water and collect as much trash as you can, exchange it for beast bucks and upgrade your equipent to collect even more trash!

Be wary of not picking out the local fauna of the river!

Help the seas be a cleaner place through teamseas.org

Download the mobile version on the Google Play Store!

This game was developed in 7 days to help the cause of #TeamSeas

Game Development, Programming, Art & Sounds by Gabo6480

Trash Pixel Art by MexicanTony
